location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to James Farish, Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus forwards statements (not transcribed) of imports and exports in British ships for the year ending 31 December 1825. The letter accuses Abdool Russool Khan [‘Abd al-Rasūl] of discriminating against British ships by confining freight in silk and treasure to his own vessels.
